even though having a bowl of noodle soup
is the more preferred preference here in
Vietnam we do have some other versions
of eggs and bread for breakfast and this
is the one great example you have
everything in the pan with the omelet
and then cut a french fries and sausage
to serve this you just need to have some
Vietnamese baguette and tear a piece and
defeat you the sunny-side up egg
hmm
it is really good the runny eggs make a
really delicious sauce
combined with the bottom and the sauce
and everything in this pan today I will
show you how to make this at home
to make the sauce you will heat some
vegetable oil in a pan and fry some
minced garlic and shallots and chili and
saute until fragrant then tomato sauce
you can also use ketchup a tablespoon of
sriracha a tablespoon of fish sauce and
half a cup of water have a taste and
adjust the seasonings if you think that
it needs more sweetness just add a
little bit more sugar if the ketchup is
already sweet enough just leave out the
sugar I'll bring to a simmer and then
turn off the heat
cut half an onion into slices and cut
potatoes into sticks I'm using a wavy
night here so you will have some really
nice cuts our potatoes cut sausage into
about 3 inch length and then split the
lower parts into four parts so when you
fry it will become a larger upper part
and then deep fry the potatoes and feel
golden brown next take the hot skillet
or a pan over medium heat and add some
vegetable oil just enough to cover the
base then add the sliced onion and fry
for about 30 seconds to draw the edges
then crack in two eggs try not to break
the yolk survive you look at the fatigue
and the potato fries and the sausage and
a few slices of ham
and of course finally three though the
sauce that's so delicious and you bring
every ingredient together garnish with
some hurts like cilantro and some tomato
and cucumber slices to add some
